author: Evelyn Cheng
title: China to lift lockdown on Wuhan city, the epicenter of its coronavirus outbreak
description: Hubei province said Tuesday that travel restrictions on the capital city of Wuhan will be removed starting Apr. 8, which would end a lockdown that began on Jan. 23.
content:
Two months after Chinese authorities locked down the city at the center of the country's coronavirus outbreak, the end is in sight.
